case = int(input())
for _ in range(case):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    length = 0
    number = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        if length == 0:
            print(arr[i], end='')
            length += 1
            number = arr[i] + 1
        elif arr[i] == number:
            length += 1
            number += 1
        elif length == 1:
            print(',', end='')
            length = 0
            number = 0
            i -= 1
        elif length == 2:
            print(',' + str(arr[i - 1]) + ',', end='')
            length = 0
            number = 0
            i -= 1
        elif length >= 3:
            print('...' + str(arr[i - 1]) + ',', end='')
            length = 0
            number = 0
            i -= 1
        i += 1
    if length == 2:
        print(',' + str(arr[i - 1]) + '', end='')
    elif length >= 3:
        print('...' + str(arr[i - 1]) + '', end='')
    print()

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = ''
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        if i != 0:
            s = s + ','
        j = i
        count = 1
        while j < n - 1 and a[j] + 1 == a[j + 1]:
            count += 1
            j += 1
        if count >= 3:
            s += str(a[i]) + '...' + str(a[j])
            i = j + 1
        else:
            s += str(a[i])
            i += 1
    print(s)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = ''
    i = 0
    while i <= n - 1:
        j = i
        cnt = 1
        while j < n - 1 and arr[j] + 1 == arr[j + 1]:
            j += 1
            cnt += 1
        if cnt > 2:
            s = s + ',' + str(arr[i]) + '...' + str(arr[j])
            i = j + 1
        else:
            s = s + ',' + str(arr[i])
            i += 1
    print(s[1:])

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    j = 0
    while j < n:
        f = 0
        print(l[j], end='')
        if j + 2 < n and l[j] == l[j + 1] - 1 and (l[j + 1] == l[j + 2] - 1):
            print('...', end='')
            j = j + 2
            while j + 1 < n and l[j] == l[j + 1] - 1:
                f = 1
                j = j + 1
            j = j - 1
        elif j != n - 1:
            print(',', end='')
        j = j + 1
    print()
